biography: Suzanne Collins (born 1962) is an American author known for her dystopian young adult fiction series, 'The Hunger Games'. biography: J.K. Rowling (born 1965) is a British author, philanthropist, film producer, television producer, and screenwriter. She is best known for writing the Harry Potter fantasy series, which has won multiple awards and sold more than 500 million copies, becoming the best-selling book series in history.
